import React ,{useEffect} from 'react' import ritik from "../images/ritik.jpg"; import {useHIstory} from "react-router-dom"; const About = () => { const history=useHistoru(); const callaboutpage=async ()=>{ try{ const res = await fetch('/about',{ method:"GET", headers:{ Accept:"application/json", "Content-Type":"application/json" }, credentials:"include" }); const data = await res.json(); console.log(data); if (!res.status === 200){ const error = new Error (res.error); throw error; } }catch(err){ console.log(err); history.push('/login'); } } useEffect(() => { callaboutpage(); }, []); return ( <>
